Subject: Content aware policy not working as intended
Description: I am trying to set up a policy where if an employee emails 5 or more attachments that it sends an alert.  I checked off all the file types and set the risk score to 5 but, I am getting alerts when just one attachment is sent.  i assume it is triggering because the attachments are in the denylist. but I cant figure out any other way to create an alert like this.
What_We_Know__c:
Threat Threshold does not interact with File Type in this way.  In fact in the log it will say that it is ignoring it.
---
Re-created policy. Use case - block Outlook emails containing 5 or more attachments.
Issue: triggers on 1 attachment
Next_Steps__c:
Informed customer threat threshold applies to PII and not file types. Waiting on customer.
---
Asking in Eng channel.
Solution_Comment__c: Answered different questions from the customer regarding PII.
